movies.title: Friday The 13<sup>th</sup> Part. 1
movies.description:
A group of camp counselors trying to reopen a summer camp called Crystal Lake, which has a grim past, are stalked by a mysterious killer.
(— IMDb)

movies.title: Friday The 13<sup>th</sup> Part. 2
movies.description:
Five years after the Cristal Lake camp massacre, investors are opening a new field on the lakeshore, not far from the fateful site. But the young people in the new camp are also starting to come under brutal attacks.
(— IMDb)

movies.title: Friday The 13<sup>th</sup> Part. 3
movies.description:
When a group of young people seek the peace and tranquility of the forest around Cristal Lake, Jason finds new prey to kill.
(— IMDb)

movies.title: Friday The 13<sup>th</sup> Final Chapter
movies.description:
When a new series of violent murders begins to unfold, residents around Cristal Lake discover that Jason may still be alive.
(— IMDb)

movies.title: Friday The 13<sup>th</sup> Part. 5
movies.description:
Still haunted by his past, Tommy Jarvis, who as a child killed Jason Voorhees, wonders if the serial killer is connected to a series of brutal murders that take place where he now lives.
(— IMDb)
